name: Real or Cake
description:
Real or Cake is a game about finding a cake that is hidden among ordinary items. To figure which item is a cake, try solving the riddle. 

Controls:

To select item stay in front of it for 3 seconds to finalize your choice.

To move use WASD or Arrow keys.

Credits:
